resources.string: Say \"send email\", \"write a note\" or \"play song\" to choose what i do for you.

To try recognition of send email : 
 -firstly say the sender email name and end your speech with email subject. 
 -secondly say the title of the email and end your speech with email body. 
 -lastly say the title of the email and end your speech with confirmation.
To try recognition of write a note say like this : \"sunny spells on Wednesday\"\n and end this speech with \"weather\".
To try phonetic recognition say anything.
